We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private LeastSquaresMovingAverage _lsma;
// In Initialize()
_lsma = LSMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_lsma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Intercept", _lsma.Intercept);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Slope", _lsma.Slope);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Period", _lsma.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Current", _lsma.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.lsma = self.LSMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.lsma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Intercept", self.lsma.Intercept);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Slope", self.lsma.Slope);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Period", self.lsma.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "LSMA Current", self.lsma.Current);
